function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper handwashing and hygiene practices","Impact":"Increased transmission of SARS-CoV-2 and other respiratory infections","Mitigation":"Promote and enforce proper handwashing techniques and hygiene practices","Technologies":"Handwashing stations, hand sanitizer dispensers, touchless fixtures","People":"General public, individuals in close contact with others","Owner":"Public health authorities, building managers, employers"},{"Description":"Close contact and spatial proximity with infected persons","Impact":"Higher risk of contracting COVID-19 and other contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promote social distancing and avoid close contact with infected persons","Technologies":"Physical barriers, occupancy sensors, contact tracing apps","People":"General public, individuals in close contact with others","Owner":"Public health authorities, employers, individuals"},{"Description":"Inadequate use and handling of masks","Impact":"Increased transmission of COVID-19 due to false sense of security and incorrect usage","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidelines on mask usage and prioritize access to masks for high-risk individuals","Technologies":"Mask distribution systems, educational campaigns, mask-wearing monitoring tools","People":"General public, individuals in close contact with others","Owner":"Public health authorities, employers, mask manufacturers"}]}
